name: places_v2_list_by_map
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool airvisual.
Tool description: Query for Air Pollution Data, Weather information, Health Recommendations, etc... as on the official application
API description: Fetches a list of places within a specified boundary box using the AirVisual API.

nelat.description: North East latitude of the boundary.

nelon.description: North East longitude of the boundary.

swlat.description: South West latitude of the boundary.

swlon.description: South West longitude of the boundary.

x_user_lang.description: Language for the response. Defaults to 'en-US'.

x_units_pressure.description: Units for pressure measurement. Allowed values are 'mbar' or 'hg'. Defaults to 'mbar'.

x_units_temperature.description: Units for temperature measurement. Allowed values are 'celsius' or 'fahrenheit'. Defaults to 'celsius'.

x_aqi_index.description: Air Quality Index standard. Allowed values are 'us' or 'cn'. Defaults to 'us'.

x_units_distance.description: Units for distance measurement. Allowed values are 'kilometer' or 'miles'. Defaults to 'kilometer'.
